{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$1.7M in 2020-2021 on contracts with JUMPING ELEPHANTS.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
